name: swimmable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Swimmable water or water temperatures are safe and suitable for swimming in: The region has launched a massive clean-up aimed at making the river swimmable within ten years. Only during summer does the lake approach swimmable temperatures. Related word
swim
More examplesFewer examplesForty percent of the country's waters are not swimmable or fishable.During the summer, the shallow waters reach pleasantly swimmable temperatures.Although the river now meets the standard under the Clean Water Act of being fishable, it still cannot be considered swimmable.
